game:gamemechanicinfo-weaponpackalpha-te:
Alpha Weapon Pack Guide
Weapon Statistic Repository

About the mod:
Alpha Weapon Pack adds 24 new weapons to the game, each with their own unique stats and quirks, and some are even gated to certain ages. This mod also changes the sounds of all weapon swings to a swoosh to make the weapons feel a bit more impactful, but does not change any vanilla weapons or tools.

Armor:
To make PVP more viable and give players options to deal with armor; AWP offers new weapon types that can have attack tiers higher than their metal base, which means they deal more damage to and through armor. In the weapon statistic chart the armor piercing values mean the base metal attack tier is either increased or decreased as such- poor: -1, normal: No change, good: +1, great: +2, armor-piercing: ignores armor entirely

Stone age weapons:

Culacula-
A simple war-paddle carved from any hardwood.
Damage- II
Speed- IV
Durability- III
Vs Armor- poor
Swing-Delay- none

Macuahuitl-
Can be made from either obsidan for more damage, or flint for more durability.
Damage- V
Speed- III
Durability- I
Vs Armor- normal
Swing-Delay- none

Bone Trident-
A long reaching trident with a set of bone forks.
Damage- III
Speed- I
Durability- III
Vs Armor- normal
Swing-Delay- long

A large, sturdy bone ready to crack some skulls.

Speed- II
Durability- II
Vs Armor- normal
Swing-Delay- short

Vs Armor- good

Javelins-
Single use throwing weapons available in all metal types but can also be made from- bone, flint, and obsidian.
Damage- VI
Speed- III
Durability- I
Vs Armor- normal
Swing-Delay- medium
